authFieldsList.help: This is the numeric Client ID, found on your API Dashboard when creating the token.
This alphanumeric string can be found on the API Dashboard.
This alphanumeric string can be found on the API Dashboard.

stepDefinitionsList.help: This step attempts to create a registrant for the given event ID.
stepDefinitionsList.name: Create an ON24 registrant

expectedFieldsList.help: This ID is used to identify the ON24 event. Event IDs can be found in your ON24 event dashboard.

expectedFieldsList.description: A Map of registrant fields and their values.
expectedFieldsList.help: All required fields for this event must be included, or else the step will result in an error.

stepDefinitionsList.help: This step attempts to "forget" (or delete) a registrant for the given event ID.
stepDefinitionsList.name: Forget an ON24 registrant

expectedFieldsList.help: This email address is used to identify the ON24 registrant who should be forgotten / deleted.
This ID is used to identify the ON24 event that this registrant should be removed from.

stepDefinitionsList.help: This step attempts to find an event registrant for the given event ID and email, then checks the value of a specified registrant field.
stepDefinitionsList.name: Check a field on an ON24 registrant
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the (?<field>.+) field on ON24 registrant (?<email>.+) for event (?<eventId>\d+) should (?<operator>be less than|be greater than|be|contain|not be|not contain) (?<expectedValue>.+)/

expectedFieldsList.help: This email address is used to find the ON24 registrant.
This ID is used to find the ON24 registrant. Event IDs can be found in your ON24 event dashboard.

expectedFieldsList.description: Check Logic (be, not be, contain, not contain, be greater than, or be less than)
